Text.Page:
Dougal has a special training mission for the Idoneal Force.

Prove your power by defeating 10 Brutal Onyx Hydraths, 10 Brutal Iron Giants, and 10 Brutal Naga Battlemasters on the Island of Dawn.

- Use the Vanguard Requests window to teleport to the Island of Dawn.
- Warriors, lancers, berserkers, slayers, priests, mystics, and brawlers can receive Apex quests upon reaching item level 439.
- Enchanting weapons can greatly increase your item level.
- The document "Apex Mission 439" vanishes when you accept this quest.

Great job, .

Your achievements have exceeded my expectations!

Claim your final reward, and continue your journey.
